name: Field Goal Hero
description:
Hello and welcome to Field Goal Hero!

This is your chance to kick the winning field goal in front of thousands. In 8 bit graphics, old school style!

From 30 yards to 100 yards, do you have what it takes to become a Field Goal Hero?

We know you're eager to join in the fun, so without further or do let's get started on the essentials:

HOW TO PLAY:

1. DRAG your finger left or right to move the target.
2. RELEASE your finger to kick the ball.
3. Allow for wind speed / direction as it changes after EVERY kick.
4. Beware the TIME remaining,

and unfortunately,

5. If you miss it's GAME OVER.

AIM OF THE GAME:

Kick as many balls as you can between the two posts in the time permitted.

HERO TIP:

In order to maximize your score, your hero can kick again while the previous balls are still in the air. For example, if skilled enough you might manage to have 4 or 5 balls in the air before a field goal is even scored. You just have to allow for the annoying wind...

GAME FEATURES:

◉ Listen out for the Field Goal Hero announcer throughout the game
◉ 50 characters to unlock
◉ 13 fun and challenging game modes
◉ 3 difficulty levels (Kids, Junior, Senior)
◉ Customize your hero team, name and number
◉ Customization of actual hero (left footer / right footer & skin color)
◉ Play with or without a helmet
◉ 8 bit old school arcade colorful graphics
◉ Funky 8 bit sounds & soundtrack
◉ Realistic ball physics
◉ 10 distances to kick from (ranging from 20 yards to 100 yards)
◉ Change the color of the ball
◉ Practice mode
◉ Game Center Leaderboards
◉ Totally free to play
◉ Portrait mode game play
◉ Listen to your own music while playing
◉ Small file size

DIFFICULTY LEVEL GUIDE:

KIDS = No wind and NO game over if field goal is missed.
JUNIOR = Slight wind and NO game over if field goal is missed.
SENIOR (default) = Wind and game over if field goal is missed.

That's about it for now. We hope you enjoy Field Goal Hero. We loved making it.

If you want to get in touch with us to say hello or tell us of a new game mode / improvements you'd like added in the next update please email us at: contact@enormacegames.com
